price: Kuma suka ƙaryata, kuma suka bi son zũciyarsu, alhãli kuwa kõwane al'amari (wanda suke son su tũre daga Annabi) an tabbatar da shi.
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
